description: The dream is real. Perl 6 is out, and regular expressions are better than ever! We'll dream up a language of our own design, and watch Perl 6 parse it and compile it to working Perl 6 code. Spend some time with the author of the ANTLR-Perl6 converter as we go beyond regular expressions into Parser Expressions, and create a working DSL in Perl 6.
title: Incepti0n in Perl 6 Design your own language
